item.title: Itemonground packet

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:2, topic:429119”]? More detail.[/quote]when there is a log on the ground ( a log you cut from a tree and if you put it on the ground )

there are two options. 1. is Take(pickup) the other 2. “light” this is the option that I want so it would automatically delete the item and make the fire object.

Read full topic

item.title: Itemonground packet
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

How would I properly use this packet? I wan’t to be able to use options for items that are on ground (for example a log being lit)

I am assuming this packet would be the one being used. I have something like this so far


switch (itemUsed) {
	case 1511:
	case 1521:
	case 1519: 
	case 1517:
	case 1515:
	case 1513:
		c.getFiremaking().checkLogType(itemUsed, groundItem);
	    // c.sendMessage("Firemaking is disabled.");
	    break;

Not entirely sure though how to make it select the second option ( which I am assuming is the problem)

Read full topic
